import React, {Fragment} from 'react'; import CSSTransitionGroup from 'react-transition-group/CSSTransitionGroup'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, } from 'reactstrap'; import cx from 'classnames'; import Switch from "react-switch"; class FormToggleSwitchExample extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { checked: false, isToggleOn: true }; this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this); } handleChange(checked) { this.setState({checked}); } handleClick() { this.setState(function (prevState) { return {isToggleOn: !prevState.isToggleOn}; }); } render() { return ( Colors
